name: Trick-Crow, Ranger
effect:
1 or more "Trick-Crow" tuner monsters + 1 or more non-tuner monsters
When this card is summoned, target one "Trick-Crow" monster in your Pendulum Zone, this card gains attack equal to 100 x the target's scale level

If a card or effect is activated that would destroy one face-up "Trick-Crow" monster you control, banish one of the Synchro materials used to summon this card; and negate the effect
serial: This card cannot be used in a Duel.
